name: To Be A Bee
description:
Have you ever wondered what it's like to be a bee? Well, now you can find out!

To Be A Bee is a VR flight simulator where you are put in the body of a bee. Fly around the greenhouse and collect nectar from flowers.  Buzz around at your own pace and take in the experience of being a bee.

Credits:

Anthony Policelli - Programmer, Audio design

Markus Tverelv - Programmer
